covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Resonating Arrow
covenants.description: Fire a resonating arrow to the target location that fills the area with echoing anima for 10 sec. The effect causes your attacks to ignore line of sight to enemies in the area, and you have 30% increased critical strike chance against them.

covenants.name: Wild Spirits
covenants.description:
Evoke the energy of Wild Spirits at the target location, applying Wild Mark to all enemy targets within the area for 15 sec, increasing damage you deal to them by 5%.

While the Wild Spirits are active, each damaging ability you use against a target affected by the Wild Mark strikes the target for (45% of Attack power) Nature damage.

covenants.name: Death Chakram
covenants.description:
Throw a deadly chakram at your current target that will rapidly deal (50% of Attack power) Shadow damage 7 times, bouncing to other targets if they are nearby.

Each time the chakram deals damage, its damage is increased by 15% and you generate 3 Focus.

covenants.name: Flayed Shot
covenants.description: Fire a shot at your enemy, causing them to bleed for (250% of Attack power) Shadow damage over 20 sec. Each time Flayed Shot deals damage, you have a 15% chance to gain Flayer's Mark, causing your next Kill Shot to be usable on any target, regardless of their current health.

conduits.name: Enfeebled Mark
conduits.description: Your attacks and abilities deal <dynamic> 5.0%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies inside Resonating Arrow.

conduits.name: Empowered Release
conduits.description: Flayed Shot has an additional 5% chance to proc Flayer's Mark and it increases the damage of your next Kill Shot by <dynamic> 5.0%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Spirit Attunement
conduits.description: Wild Spirits duration is increased by 3 sec and the damage dealt is increased by <dynamic> 10.0%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Necrotic Barrage
conduits.description: Death Chakram generates an additional 2 Focus and the damage is increased by <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Markman's Advantage
conduits.description: Hunter's Mark decreases the damage the target deals to you by<dynamic> 3.0%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Harmony of the Tortollan
conduits.description: Aspect of the Turtle cooldown reduced by<dynamic> 10.0</dynamic> sec.

conduits.name: Rejuvenating Wind
conduits.description: Exhilaration heals you for an additional<dynamic> 10.0%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 8 sec.

legendaries.name: Call of the Wild
legendaries.description:
The cooldown of all of your Aspects

<spec>Marksmanship</spec>
<dynamic>and Trueshot</dynamic>

<spec>Survival</spec>
<dynamic>and Coordinated Assault</dynamic>

 is reduced by 25%.

legendaries.name: Nessingwary's Trapping Apparatus
legendaries.description: Whenever a trap is triggered, gain 25 Focus.

legendaries.name: Soulforge Embers
legendaries.description: Launching a Flare into your Tar Trap causes all enemies inside of the Tar Trap to burn for (900% of Attack power) Fire damage over 12 sec.

legendaries.name: Craven Strategem
legendaries.description: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

legendaries.name: Dire Command
legendaries.description: Kill Command has a 10% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target.

legendaries.name: Flamewaker's Cobra Sting
legendaries.description: Cobra Shot has a 10% chance to make your next Kill Command consume no Focus.

legendaries.name: Qa'pla, Eredun War Order
legendaries.description: Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 4.0 sec.

legendaries.name: Rylakstalker's Piercing Fangs
legendaries.description: While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 30%.

legendaries.name: Eagletalon's True Focus
legendaries.description: Trueshot also reduces the Focus cost of all of your abilities by 30%.

legendaries.name: Surging Shots
legendaries.description: Rapid Fire deals 15% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

legendaries.name: Serpentstalker's Trickery
legendaries.description: When Aimed Shot hits multiple targets from the Trick Shots effect, 3 enemies struck by the Aimed Shot also get hit by an Arcane Shot.

legendaries.name: Secrets of the Unblinking Vigil
legendaries.description: When you gain the Trick Shots effect, you have a 50% chance for it to not be consumed by your next Aimed Shot or Rapid Fire.

legendaries.name: Wildfire Cluster
legendaries.description: Wildfire Bomb drops an additional cluster of bombs around the target, each exploding for (33% of Attack power) Fire damage.

legendaries.name: Rylakstalker's Confounding Strikes
legendaries.description:
<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike has a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb.

legendaries.name: Latent Poison Injectors
legendaries.description:
Serpent Sting's damage applies Latent Poison to the target, stacking up to 10 times. 

<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike consumes all stacks of Latent Poison, dealing (10% of Attack power) Nature damage to the target per stack consumed.

legendaries.name: Butcher's Bone Fragments
legendaries.description:
<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike increases the damage of your next 

<condition>Butchery</condition>
<dynamic>Butchery</dynamic>

Carve by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.
